General.Name: Jiangsu Hualan New Pharmaceutical Material Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Hualan New Pharmaceutical Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of packaging materials for the pharmaceuticals industry in China and internationally. It offers covered rubber stoppers series; halogenated butyl rubber stopper freeze-dryied series; halogenated butyl rubber stopper antibiotics series; halogenated butyl rubber stopper transfusion series; combination cap series for plastic infusion vessel; polyisoprene gaskets; blood plugs; halogenated butyl rubber stopper for oral dosage forms; pre-potted protective caps; medical instruments; and pen style products. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

3.Name: Ms. Xue  Liu
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
